reviewText: I have viewed all three of the Lain videos.  I had to watch them several times to gain the slightest bit of understanding.  If you are a Matrix fan, I think you will love this movie.

I just finish watching it, and I just wanted to sleep it`s too complicated, the plot twists  and changes, and you get confused Lain is so  booring, and plain!  that she has to create another self in the wire!  YAC If you like anime to be entertaining, funny............a god laugh  please and I repeate please do not watch LAIN, but if you are the type of  persons who likes abstract things and likes to take out a personal  conclusion buy this video!
